To use the JavaScript API minimal server-side preparation is necessary:

  • Include the JavaScript file ugc.nocache.js via a headinclude into the formatter that renders the form. The JavaScript file is shipped with the module org.opencms.ugc and located in the module's sub-folder resources/ugc/. The file exposes the UGC JavaScript API.
    Optionally, you can include the file ugc-jquery.js, found in the module's subfolder resources/js/. It exposes an easy to use wrapper for the native JavaScript API.
